Comment.Language: The following doxology is said on the ordinations (while wearing the schema) and the visits of the Patriarch and the bishops during the Morning and Evening Raising of Incense

Text.Language: Ak[i t~,aric m~Mwuc/c: ]metou/b n~te Mel,icedek: ak[i m~p~taio m~peniwt Petroc: pianjwj n~nia~poctoloc.
You received the grace of Moses, the priesthood of Melchizedek, you received honor from our father Peter, the first of the apostles.
Ù†Ù?Ù„ØªÙŽ Ù†Ø¹Ù…Ø© Ù…ÙˆØ³Ù‰ ÙˆÙƒÙ‡Ù†ÙˆØª Ù…Ù„Ø´ÙŠØµØ§Ø¯Ø§Ù‚ ÙˆØ£Ø®Ø°Øª ÙƒØ±Ø§Ù…Ø© Ø£Ø¨ÙŠÙ†Ø§ Ø¨Ø·Ø±Ø³ Ø¨ÙƒØ± Ø§Ù„Ø±Ø³Ù„.
AP,#c# talo n~tefjij: n~oui~nam e~jen teka~ve: aftenhoutk e~nisost: n~te y~metouro n~niv/oui.
Christ lifted His right hand, on your head, He gave you the keys, of the kingdom of heaven.

Eyrekswpi n~oureferhemi: cap~swi n~]ekkl/cia: eyreka~moni m~peklaoc: qen outoubo nem oumeym/i.
That you may govern, over the church, and that you may shepherd your people, in purity and righteousness.

Wcautwc ten[ici m~mok: nem pihumnodoc Dauid: je n~yok pe piou/b sa e~neh: kata t~taxic m~Mel,icedek.
Likewise we magnify You, with David the Psalmist, You are the priest forever, according to the order of Melchizedek.

Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ pao#c# n~iwt m~patriar,/c: peniwt e#y#u# abba (...): n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O my father the patriarch, our holy father abba (...), that He may for give us our sins.

Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: neniw] e#y#u# n~dikeoc: nim/tropolit/c nem nie~pickopoc n/et,/ neman: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf: O my saintly fathers the righteous: the metropolitans and the bishops assembled with us: that He may forgive us our sins.
